comments.body: If we are simplifying the message, we may not need to have `AlterTableComand.operation`. I can remove it in #33200.

This is slightly different from master: https://github.com/apache/spark/blob/37c4cd8f05316227465ff9cccbba063779827660/sql/core/src/test/scala/org/apache/spark/sql/execution/datasources/v2/jdbc/JDBCTableCatalogSuite.scala#L112-L113

since the table look up done in `DataSourceV2Strategy` instead of `Analyzer` (#30610).
